arts.ttl: “We took too few risks”: Paulo Fonseca reflects on Milan’s draw against Juventus
arts.sum: AC Milan’s match against Juventus ended in a goalless draw, a result that left coach Paulo Fonseca with mixed feelings. Following the game, he addressed the media, expressing his thoughts on the team’s performance and their approach to the match. Fonseca began by acknowledging the fans’ frustration, stating, “After a match like this, it’s normal to hear boos because I don’t want to come to the stadium and see a game like that. I understand the supporters.” His comments highlighted the expectations surrounding such a high-profile fixture. arts.ttl: “We didn’t concede anything to the opposition”: Thiago Motta reflects on Juventus’ performance against Milan
arts.sum: Juventus and Milan shared the spoils in a tightly contested match that ended in a 0-0 draw. Following the game, Juventus coach Thiago Motta expressed his satisfaction with the team’s performance, particularly their defensive efforts. Motta began by stating, “I am satisfied with the work we did, especially defensively. We did not concede anything to our opponents: open space is their strength, and we managed to block them.” He acknowledged that while Juventus struggled to create many offensive chances, they were able to reach good areas on the pitch. “This point can provide continuity to our work.
